BodyName: Committee on Fire and Criminal Justice Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to mandating that the commissioner of the fire department promulgate rules requiring certain building owners to file a list with the fire department indicating the number of each floor of the building.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Granting the commissioner of the fire department the authority to promulgate rules requiring the owners of buildings in occupancy group J-2 to file floor plans with the fire department.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to mandating that the commissioner of the fire department promulgate rules requiring certain building owners to file a list with the fire department indicating the number of each floor of the building.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Granting the commissioner of the fire department the authority to promulgate rules requiring the owners of buildings in occupancy group J-2 to file floor plans with the fire department.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to mandating that the commissioner of the fire department promulgate rules requiring certain building owners to file a list with the fire department indicating the number of each floor of the building.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Granting the commissioner of the fire department the authority to promulgate rules requiring the owners of buildings in occupancy group J-2 to file floor plans with the fire department.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to mandating that the commissioner of the fire department promulgate rules requiring certain building owners to file a list with the fire department indicating the number of each floor of the building.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Granting the commissioner of the fire department the authority to promulgate rules requiring the owners of buildings in occupancy group J-2 to file floor plans with the fire department.
